title: Bye Tom/Pete/Amy, Corona Beer Thriving 3.3.20
itunes:title: Bye Tom/Pete/Amy, Corona Beer Thriving 3.3.20
description:
In episode 581, Miles and special guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by the Scam Goddess Laci Mosley to discuss the South Carolina primaries, the end of Pete and Amy's campaigns, Mike Bloomberg's apology for his past behavior, how Bloomberg dealt with past emergencies, the passing of James Lipton, Chili's 45th birthday, the truth behind the Corona beer slander, the end of Judge Judy, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. South Carolina 2020 Primary: Live Results
  2. Pete Buttigieg ends his historic presidential campaign
  3. Amy Klobuchar will end 2020 presidential campaign and endorse Joe Biden
  4. “If I annoyed somebody or hurt somebody, I apologize. I can’t go rewrite history; I can only tell you now it is a different world,” says Michael Bloomberg in response to claims about his treatment of some female employees in the early years of his company.
  5. Bloody Sunday remembered: civil rights marchers tell story of their iconic photos
  6. Mayor Bloomberg under fire for handling of blizzard
  7. Shocker: Bloomberg Was Totally in Bermuda During Blizzard
  8. James Lipton, Creator and Host of 'Inside the Actors Studio,' Dies at 93
  9. Chili’s is hell-bent on celebrating its 45th birthday in style
  10. What the Dubious Corona Poll Reveals
  11. Are 38 Percent of Americans Avoiding Corona Beer Because of the Coronavirus?
  12. Corona Beer Brewer Disputes Claims of Virus Impact on Sales
  13. Corona will continue controversial promotion for hard seltzer amid coronavirus outbreak
  14. 'Judge Judy' to end after 25 seasons as Sheindlin moves on to a new project
  15. WATCH: PoptartPete - So Special (Gonna Last)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
